items.title: Greeting
items.content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to Bunoraa. How can we help you today?

items.title: Order Status
items.content: I can help with your order status. Please share your order number and the email used at checkout.

items.title: Shipping Help
items.content: Shipping times vary by location. Please share your delivery city and we will confirm the estimate.

items.title: Returns
items.content: We are happy to help with returns. Please share your order number and the item you want to return.
